title: Marketplace Music: Our very own music station
contentencoded:
If you're a Marketplace fan then you know we take great pride in the music selections we play between stories from new artists, underground musicians and classic hit makers. Now, we’re delivering that to you in a 24-hour music stream.

Marketplace Music on Slacker Radio is a curated playlist of songs featured on all of the Marketplace family of shows, including Marketplace, the Morning Report, Marketplace Tech, and Marketplace Money.
teaser: Listen to some of our favorite tunes.
